stages.name: Burning School Gym
stages.description: The school gym is ablaze! Defeat the source of the inferno.

stages.name: School Yard
stages.description: The school yard crackles with heat. Five Blazing Elementals block the path!

stages.name: Scorched Cafeteria
stages.description: The cafeteria has been transformed into a hellish kitchen. Be careful of explosive ovens and flame jets!

stages.name: Molten Library
stages.description: Ancient knowledge burns in magical flames. The books have come alive and seek vengeance!

stages.name: Rooftop
stages.description: The school rooftop offers a vantage point, but a fearsome Infernal Scorpion guards it.

stages.name: Bathroom Fight
stages.description: Infernal Birdie, the corrupted cleaning man, attacks with deadly chains!

stages.name: Principal's Office
stages.description: The heart of the inferno lies within. Defeat the mastermind behind the school's fiery fate!

stages.name: Forest Entrance
stages.description: The gateway to the mystical forest is guarded by twisted vegetation and corrupt wildlife.

stages.name: Ancient Grove
stages.description: The heart of the forest holds ancient magic. The trees themselves will try to stop your progress!

stages.name: Mushroom Caverns
stages.description: Below the forest lies a network of caves filled with toxic fungi and luminescent spores.

stages.name: Crystal Springs
stages.description: The magical wellspring of the forest has been tainted. Purify it by defeating its corrupted protector!

stages.name: Heart of Corruption
stages.description: Face the source of the corruption and cleanse the forest once and for all!

stages.name: Submerged Gateway
stages.description: The entrance to Atlantis lies partially underwater. Defeat the guardians to gain access to the city.

stages.name: Coral District
stages.description: Once a residential area, now overrun with aquatic creatures and animated coral formations.

stages.name: Temple of Poseidon
stages.description: The grand temple still contains powerful magic and is guarded by devoted servants of the sea god.

stages.name: Royal Palace
stages.description: The seat of Atlantean power, where the last king still rules over his drowned subjects.

stages.name: Power Core
stages.description: The ancient technology that raised the city is unstable. Defeat its controller before Atlantis rises fully!

stages.name: Abyssal Throne
stages.description: The true ruler of Atlantis awaits in the darkest depths. An ancient evil that must be defeated!

stages.name: Returning to the Burning School Gym
stages.description: The flames rage anew! The masterminds behind this chaos, Infernal Ibuki and Infernal Raiden, await in the restored inferno.

stages.name: 5v5 - Blazing School Day
stages.description: A full-scale infernal assault on the school! Gather your best team of 5 School characters to face the combined might of the Blazing School Day bosses.

stages.name: Farm Showdown
stages.description: The farmers have challenged you to a battle! Defeat all three farmers to prove your worth.

stages.name: An Angry Carrot
stages.description: A strangely aggressive carrot blocks the path into the farmland.
